summary: Completed comprehensive testing of centralized design system implementation. Verified CSS variables, Tailwind configuration, and frontend compilation/loading. All design tokens properly implemented with ERPNext-style black primary, blue secondary, and greyish card/form backgrounds.
passed_tests: CSS variables properly defined in /app/src/index.css with correct color values
Tailwind config successfully includes design tokens mapped to CSS variables
Frontend compiles without errors using Vite build system
Application loads successfully on port 3000 without JavaScript errors
Design system colors correctly applied: Primary (0 0% 9%), Secondary (217 91% 60%), Card/Form BG (210 20% 98%)
React app structure properly initialized with root element
UI components render correctly: sidebar, header, main content area
23 buttons found and all are clickable with proper styling
Professional healthcare CRM interface with clean layout and typography
Page title correctly set to 'AI Clinic CRM with Patient Protocols'
